Title: The Yellow King - Part III
Descriptions: So you're looking for the Yellow King, huh? Be careful what you wish for. This guy is a piece of work. He and his group of bandits hang out in the underground bunker near Dambog. You'll need this Punched Card to get in there. There has been a bounty on the King's head for years. If you find him, he's not going to cooperate with you. You'll have to kill him. Trust me, you'll be doing the people of Livonia a favour. If you manage to pull that off, take his helmet to Sebastian at Sanctuary. I'm sure he'll pay you handsomely for it. Be careful survivor. The Yellow King and his group are heavily armed. You'd better be prepared for violence if you go into that bunker. Good luck.

You'll need this Punched Card to get in there. There has been a bounty on the King's head for years. If you find him, he's not going to cooperate with you. You'll have to kill him. Trust me, you'll be doing the people of Livonia a favour. If you manage to pull that off, take his helmet to Sebastian at Sanctuary. I'm sure he'll pay you handsomely for it. Be careful survivor. The Yellow King and his group are heavily armed. You'd better be prepared for violence if you go into that bunker. Good luck.

You did it. You killed the Yellow King. I don't believe it. You have no idea how many lives you just saved, survivor. I don't know what else to say. Here, I guess. It's the only thing I have to offer. Take this box of five thousand nails. Use them to trade or use them to build. Whatever you want. You deserve it. Thank you, survivor. Oh and don't worry - we got Hans out of that jail cell. He's a little skinny, but he'll survive.
ObjectiveText: Kill the Yellow King and deliver his helmet to Sebastian at Sanctuary.
